<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Spriggan Warlord](/Monsters.aspx?ID=818)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

While the leaders of larger spriggan enclaves tend to be uniquely trained warriors with highly specialized skills, spriggan warlords are fond of the traditional spriggan weaponry of morningstar and crossbow, valuing this traditional fighting style for its simplicity and for using both weapons to their full potential. Spriggan warlords often serve as sub-commanders in large groups, filling roles in spriggan society akin to captains of the guard or bodyguards to spriggan royalty. In smaller groups or remote outposts, a single spriggan warlord is typically in charge of a band of spriggan bullies.

<column gap="tiny">

([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Spriggan Warlord](/Monsters.aspx?ID=818)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Spriggan" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=309" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 253 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +14; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +15, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +17, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +17, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +14, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** +1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
[_+1 crossbow_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (10 bolts), [_+1 morningstar_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 120

**Enraged Growth** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Trigger** The spriggan warlord takes damage; **Effect** The spriggan warlord grows to size Large, along with their equipment (which returns to natural size if removed). The spriggan warlord's reach increases by 5 feet. They regain 15 Hit Points and gain a +2 status bonus to melee attack and damage rolls. This effect continues until the end of the spriggan warlord's next turn, but on any turn in which the spriggan warlord deals damage to another creature and is not [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15), the effect extends until the end of the following turn. When Enraged Growth ends, the spriggan warlord is fatigued for 1 hour.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_morningstar_ +18 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d6+9 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_crossbow_ +18 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d8 piercing

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 25
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28)
- **3rd**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110)
- **4th**
[Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Shatter](/Spells.aspx?ID=279)

**Bully's Bludgeon** <actions string="Single Action" />  The spriggan warlord makes a morningstar Strike with a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll. This attack is [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188).

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The spriggan warlord's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Warlord's Training**   A spriggan warlord has access to the critical specialization effects for [crossbows](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) and [morningstars](/Weapons.aspx?ID=8), and the reload of any crossbow they wield is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

</column>
